message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond its worth to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to offer $12,000 for it.
Bob, thanks for your interest. I understand your perspective on the price.  While I value your offer, $20,000 represents my bottom line to make this work.  Is there any flexibility in your budget?
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit over budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $15,000 for the product.
